title: American-made Ibis Exie MTB starts shipping today with a 4.4lb frame
content:
It’s finally here. After starting with a limited run of small Ripleys, Ibis has scaled up Carbon 831 to introduce its first new carbon model that is completely U.S.-made. We got a sneak peek at the new Ibis Exie a month ago, but now the completed bikes are rolling out of their Californian carbon facility […]

author: Zach Overholt
